string.text: Flash drive with data on the thread for silencers

Flash disk containing information on the application of threads on the barrel to install a silencer. Detailed guidance. Inexperienced technicians will welcome such a find and will be able to make a new upgrade or several new upgrades thanks to the information from the flash disk.

Flash disk containing information on a variety of plates and inserts in suits, as well as the technology of their installation. Detailed guidance. Technicians will be happy with this discovery and will be able to make a new upgrade or several new upgrades thanks to the information from the flash disk.
